title: China Modern Huizhou Downtown Escape with Three Outstanding Restaurants
description: Discover Huizhou's curious mix of modern cityscape and ancient Old Town when you stay at Crowne Plaza Huizhou, an IHG Hotel. Three exceptional restaurants are onsite, ready to satisfy any craving, whether you're after popular Asian and international favourites, authentic Cantonese specialties or high-end Japanese cuisine. When you're not shopping up a storm downtown, spend quiet moments in the hotel's indoor or outdoor swimming pool or keep up with your fitness routine at the gym.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Huizhou, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.8 Huangguan Rd Shuikou Ave, Huicheng District, Huizhou 516002, China

title: Five-Star Huizhou Elegance with Hot Springs & Two Swimming Pools
description: Experience high-end opulence and Chinese elegance at the lavish InterContinental Huizhou Resort, an IHG Hotel, ideally located just outside Huizhou. Elegantly appointed, this five-star property defines grandeur with its lavish swimming pool and three distinct restaurants, bars and lounges. When not dining or relaxing, explore the nearby lakes and ancient pagodas of West Lake, be enticed by the ocean landscapes of Daya Bay and Xunliao Bay or discover the origins of Kung Fu at Luofu Mountain.
location_description: InterContinental Huizhou Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1 Wenquan Dadao, Hengli Town, Huizhou, 516001, China
